passive.name: RAVENOUS FLOCK
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) RAVENOUS FLOCK
                                Swain collect Soul Fragments when Vision of Empire and Nevermove hit enemy champion, and also when they die.Soul Fragments heal for 3% health () and provide 16 maximum health.

q.name: (Q) DEATH'S HAND
q.description:
(Q) DEATH'S HAND
 6/5/4/3s   50 
                                
                                
                                Swain extends his demonic arm to launch eldritch bots at enemies, dealing 55 magic damage (55/90/125/160 + 32% ) to enemies within range.Each bolt after the first deals 10 magic damage (10/20/30/40 + 12% ) (up to 110 damage).

w.name: (W) VISION OF EMPIRE
w.description:
(W) VISION OF EMPIRE
 21/20/19/18s   65 
                                
                                
                                Swain summons a demonic eye that explodes after a short delay, dealing 80 magic damage (80/130/180/230 + 55% ), slowing by 30/40/50/60% for 2.5 seconds and revealing targets hit for 4 seconds. If Vision of Empire damages an immobilized champion it will critically strike  for 50% damage.Champions hit will give 1 soul fragment(s).

e.name: (E) NEVERMOVE
e.description:
(E) NEVERMOVE
 10s   60 
                                
                                
                                Swain launches a demonic wave that deals 35 magic damage (35/85/135/185 + 25% ) to enemies along the way, then turns back after reaching the furthest distance, dealing 35 magic damage (35/50/65/80 + 25% ) to the area and rooting enemies within the area for 1.5 seconds.Recast: Swain pulls the rooted champions to himself and collects 1 Soul Fragment from targets.

r.name: (R) DEMONIC ASCENSION
r.description:
(R) DEMONIC ASCENSION
 75/65/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Swain frees the demon, dealing 20 magic damage (15/35/55 + 20% ) per second to enemies within his range and restoring 20 health (20/30/40 + 20% ) to himself.Recast: Can be cast again  after 2 seconds of Demonic Ascension, dealing damage and slowing enemies.Non-champion units will restore 10% health.Demon Ascension is controlled by Demon Energy, which depletes over time, and can be recharged indefinitely by draining enemy Champions,  Champion takedowns fully restore Demon Energy.
notes: range and restoring 20 health (20/30/40 + 20% ) to himself

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it for 4 seconds, dealing bonus damage.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
